title: Comparing the LD-50 of household substances

content.prompt: Based on the LD 50 values, which of the following best describes the toxicity level of the household substances shown in the table?

choices.label: Aspirin is less toxic than vinegar.
Table salt is more toxic than vinegar.
Antifreeze is more toxic than aspirin.
Table salt is the most toxic substance in the table.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
